title: Weapon Goals
description: These are my personal views on best rolls for each weapon in game.

// Braytech Werewolf 
// Arrowhead Brake
// High-Caliber Rounds
// Dynamic Sway Reduction
// Tap the Trigger
// Origin Trait: None
//notes: Masterwork: Range, Mod: Targeting Adjuster
dimwishlist:item=528834068&perks=839105230,1561002382,1359896290,1890422124
